person.content:

Paragraph: Five people were killed when a crop-spraying plane preparing for takeoff crashed into a light delivery vehicle in South Africa 's North West region , state radio reported on Friday .

| --- |

| 2. The pilot of the crop-spraying plane |
| 3. The driver of the light delivery vehicle |
